titles.title: Hallelujah! For The Lord Our God, The Almighty, Reigns

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! For the Lord our God,
The Almighty, reigns! (2x)
Great is He who is King of kings,
And Lord of lords.
You are wonderful.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let us rejoice and be glad, giving the glory to Him.
For the marriage of the Lamb has come
And the bride hath made herself ready

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah! Salvation and glory,
Honor and power belong to our God. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord, ye servants of the Lord
You who fear His name lift Him up
Both the small and great (Repeat.).

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Aleluya! porque nuestro Dios poderoso reina!
Aleluya! porque nuestro Dios poderoso reina.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Grande es el Rey de reyes, Señor de señores.
Admirable! (2x)
